dict.acceptation: 颈，脖子；衣领；海峡；[地]岩颈；
搂着脖子亲吻，相拥互吻；变狭窄；
使变细；与…搂著脖子亲吻；割颈杀死（家禽等）；

sent.orig: Neck-Measure the base of your neck, keeping one finger between our neck and the tape.
sent.trans: 颈围-测量你的颈根围一周，并保证留有一个手指的松量。

sent.orig: After surgery, the neck is protected by a soft neck collar the patient is gradually mobilized.
sent.trans: 术后软质围领保护颈部，病人逐渐活动。
那是一场势均力敌的比赛。

sent.orig: Having a short neck, he is not suitable to wear a turtle neck sweater.
sent.trans: 他脖子短，不适合穿立领的毛衣。

sent.orig: Corporate America and corporate Europe are now neck and neck in the globalisation stakes.
sent.trans: 因此可以说美欧企业在全球化的大棋局中仍然平分秋色。
